author: lundblad
msg: Ensure that libsvn_ra_dav converts the encoding of Neon error messages to
UTF-8.
* libsvn_ra_dav/ra_dav.h, libsvn_ra_dav/util.c, libsvn_ra_dav/commit.c,
libsvn_ra_dav/fetch.c (svn_ra_dav__convert_error): Added pool argument.
Callers updated.
Convert error message and hostname acquired from Neon to UTF-8.

author: lundblad
msg: Replaced calls of printf, fprintf and fputs with the svn_cmdline_* variants
in the command line client.  Part of fix for issue #780.
This applies to all modified .c files.  Other changes are noted below.
Also, some strings marked for translation.
* clients/cmdline/props.c (svn_cl__print_prop_hash): No replacement.
Instead add a ### comment about the problem of printing out property values
with unknown encoding (i.e. non-svn: properties.)
* clients/cmdline/cl.h, clients/cmdline/util.c (svn_cl__print_commit_info):
Return svn_error_t * and take a pool argument.
* clients/cmdline/notify.c (struct notify_baton): Added had_print_error.
(svn_cl__get_notifier): Initialize had_print_error to FALSE.
(notify): If a print error occurs, print it if it is the first error in this
operation.
* client/cmdline/cl.h, clients/cmdline/status.c (svn_cl__print_status,
print_status): Return svn_error_t * and check for errors.
* clients/cmdline/status-cmd.c (struct status_baton): Add had_print_error
field.
(svn_cl__status): Initialize had_print_error to FALSE in status baton.
(print_status): Ensure that no more than one print error is output.

author: kfogel
msg: * www/security.html: Add a comment about the anti-spam measure.

author: cmpilato
msg: Clarify that patches for existing issues should get attached to those
issues; otherwise, a new PATCH issue gets filed.
* HACKING (Patch submission guidelines)

author: sussman
msg: * www/project_faq.html: Make explicit the limitations on running a server on
Win95 and friends, versus using a client.
Patch by: François Beausoleil <fbos@users.sourceforge.net>
